column4: ホントよホント！
column6: I'm telling you, it's true!

column4:
なるちゃんから
電話があったんだから！
column6: Naru+-chan++ told me over the phone!

column4: ……信じられないわ。ネフライトは死んだのよ
column6: ...It's hard to believe. Nephrite is dead.

column4: うさぎだって見たでしょ？
column6: You saw it yourself, Usagi.

column4: もしかしたらニセモノってこともありえるわ
column6: It's possible that it's someone pretending to be him.

column4: 死んだ人間が存在するっていうのもおかしな話だし…
column6: It's a fact that the dead cannot come back to life.

column4: ちょ、ちょっとまってよ！何でそうなるのよ！？
column6: Wait a minute! Why do you have to be like that?!

column4: ネフライトは命がけで敵から逃げてきたのよ！
column6: Nephrite risked his life to get away from the enemy,

column4: 銀水晶をねらっているヤツがいるって
column6: all so he could let me know that someone's after the Silver Crystal!

column4: わたしに教えるために！
……それにもしニセモノだとしても
column6: ...Besides, no matter how convincing a faker might be,

column4:
なるちゃんの目までは
ごまかせないハズよ
column6: there's no way he'd fool Naru+-chan++.

column4: ねっ！　まこちゃんと美奈子ちゃんはどう思う？
column6: Mako+-chan++, Minako+-chan++, what do you think?

column4: どうって…あたしは、そのネフライトってのと会った
column6: I don't know what to say...

column4: ことないから、どんなヤツかわからないし……
column6:
I've never actually met Nephrite.
I don't know what kind of person he is...

column4: そもそも
column6: Besides, who is this new enemy he ran away from, anyway?

column4: その人が逃げ出してきた新しい敵って何者なの？
だからぁ、よくわかんないけど銀水晶をねらってて
column6: Look, I didn't really get all of it!

column4: ベリルはダークキングダムを復活させようとしてて
column6: I just know that someone's after the Silver Crystal, Queen Beryl's Dark Kingdom is back,

column4: ネフライトは必死でピンチなのよ！
column6: and Nephrite's in big trouble!

column4: つまり、新たに銀水晶をねらう者がいて……
column6: In other words, a new foe wants to obtain the Silver Crystal...

column4: ダークキングダムのクインベリルと四天王をよみがえ
column6: Thus, they've resurrected Queen Beryl and her +Shitennou+Four Heavenly Kings+ to use as pawns in their plan.

column4: らせ自らの配下においた
今のところ、そいつの正体は不明
column6: We don't yet know the identity of this new threat,

column4: 銀水晶を使って何をしようとしているのかも不明
column6: nor what they intend to do with the Silver Crystal.

column4: うさぎちゃんがセーラームーンであることを知ってい
column6: Since Nephrite is aware of Usagi+-chan++'s identity as Sailor Moon,

column4: るネフライトは
〔ルナ〕
column6: (Luna)

column4: そのことをいち早く知らせようと
column6: he risked his life to leave their organization in order

column4: そのことをいち早く知らせようと
column6: he risked his life to leave their organization in order to inform her of their plan as soon as possible.

column6: When you consider Naru+-chan++'s involvement,

column6: we can assume that Nephrite has turned over a new leaf...

column6: ...is what Usagi+-chan++ is trying to say. Correct?

column4: そう！　そうなのよ！！
column6: Yeah, that's exactly it!

column4:
すごいな、ルナ
よくわかったね
column6: I'm impressed you could glean all that, Luna.

column4: まあ、付き合いが長いからね……
column6: Let's just say I've known her too long.

column4: とにかく！　話ができすぎてるわ。信用できない
column6: This is all too convenient. I don't trust him.

column4: レイちゃん！！
column6: Rei+-chan++!

column4: ……どっちにしても
column6: ...Be that as it may,

column4: その人は今なるちゃんの所にいるんでしょ？
column6: he's at Naru+-chan++'s place right now, right?

column6: The enemy may attempt to get him back.

column4: もういい！！
column6: Ugh! WHATEVER!
